body.name: Ermnois Executive Office Chair, Ergonomic Home Office Desk Chair with Wheels, Thicken Armrest and Lumbar Support, Upholstered Leather Mid-Back Computer Gaming Chair with Tilt Function, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 14 mins
features: 【Comfy and Durable】 IMPORTANT: Some parts are zipped inside the chair back, NOT MISSING PARTS. The seat of the executive leather office chair are filled with high-density foam, providing great comfort for your body. The thicken armrest keep your arm soothing. This home office chair is made of high-quality PU leather, which is softer and more breathable, skin-friendly, and durable for long-time use. Thanks to the premium PU leather, this computer chair is water-proof, won't tear easily and is easy to clean.

【Relax Your Body】This executive office Chair is well-made with an ergonomic design. The back of this leather desk office chair was designed to come along with the natural lines of the human body's spine. The strong back and lumbar support can relieve your backache and lumbago after hours of working. The thick-padded armrest helps reduce the pain in your wrists. The well-padded seat cushion offers great comfort even after long-lasting hours of sitting for working, gaming, and studying.

【Adjustable Features】Thanks to its SGS certified gas lift, the height of this leather office chair can be adjusted from 40.55'' to 43.7'' and the seat can be adjusted from 15.35'' to 18.50'' to fit your desk and your height. The back can lean from 90°to 110°for you to take a break. The soft and comfy headrest can help you have a better rest. The 360°swiveling seat and casters make this executive desk chair moves smoothly and quietly.

【Sturdy Structure】The heavy-duty metal base of this study chair provides a weight capacity of 300 pounds. The 5 nylon casters are friendly to your floors, carpets and mats. This black office chair was made of better materials and has gone through a series of tests. All these make this perfect office desk chair solid, safe, sturdy and not easily deformed.

【Easy Life】This PU leather task chair makes your life easier. It comes with instructions and assembly tools. We also provide videos for this assemble of this ergonomic executive chair. The durable PU leather surface is in high quality and easy to clean. Get this ergonomic office chair to have an easier life!

【Garantee and Service】We offers a 1-year warranty from the date of purchase. Please feel free to get in touch with us if any questions. We are more than happy to solve all the problems and try our best to provide a satisfactory experience.

Perfect for smooth height adjustment. Durable enough for a very long lasting use. A good gas lift can help you find your favorite position. The high quality casters do no harm to your floor or carpets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a Real Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: From a wicker chair and folding table to a real desk and office chair ..... This office chair is great! Arrived promptly in perfect condition. Easy to assemble. Great price! Leather is soft. Chair is comfortable. It swivels, rolls, height is adjustable. Arm rests are thick and padded . Works well with my modern live edge desk. Seat is deep so if you are a shorty like me (5'2"), you may need a pillow behind your back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this chair for a couple months. I bought it to replace one that broke after 1 year of continuous use (8+ hours a day). I can already tell this chair will hold up for me much better, and it’s super comfortable as well! Easy to assemble, no issues whatsoever. When it comes down to it, I will purchase this office chair again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This chair was packaged well and not difficult to put together. I've been using it for a couple months and I'm very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy chair, comfy price!
reviews.reviewText: Love this Ermnois Executive Office Chair, Ergonomic Home Office Desk Chair with Wheels. I'm nowhere near the stated "300lb max weight" for this chair, butt you gotta know that a chair that can hold 300lbs will be cush for your tush if you're not that heavy. Also love the zippered back of the chair for storage space or to add a heat pad. Keep in mind, the armrests don't fold up, not a big deal and I knew that when I bought it. Great chair, great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You don't want this chair.
reviews.reviewText: Update: Before I could return the chair, the seller graciously refunded my purchase price. While this chair didn't match what I was looking for, I would purchase other product from this seller based solely on their excellent customer service.I should've paid better attention. I was looking for a big & tall chair, and this came up as one of the first choices. I saw the "400 LBS" picture and thought that would be more than sufficient (I weight around 255). But I didn't realize how short the back is. I'm 6'2", and the back "cushion" doesn't even come up to my shoulders.About half of the chair hardware (the arms, the base, and the legs) is packed into the empty back "cushion", leaving very actual cushion for your back. I doubt very highly that it gives lumbar support; it's basically a thin layer of cushion and then nothing.The chair also feels tight, which seems bizarre for a chair advertising it can hold up to 400 lbs of weight. I measured the distance between my current chair and this one, and the distance between the two armrests is a full two inches shorter (19" versus my current chair's 21" body room).It's just a very uncomfortable chair. I'll be returning this.
